DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate factor affect comfortable contact lens wear factor affect contact lens replacement frequency .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant begin Phase 1 , follow either Cycle A Cycle B , cross second cycle complete first . After Phase 1 result evaluate , eligible participant enter Phase 2 . After Phase 2 result evaluate , participant consistently report high low comfort score enter Phase 3 define either survivor struggler .
DOC.criteria: At least 17 year age . Ocular exam last two year . Currently wear hydrogel silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear basis monthly replacement schedule . Wearing contact lens least five day per week minimum 10 hour day . Able wear lens available power range bestcorrected visual acuity least 20/32 eye . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular disease . Systemic condition may affect study outcome . Using systemic topical medication may affect ocular health . Wears lenses extend continuous wear schedule . Habitually wear multifocal lens . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
